name: Tenzui Software
overview:
Tenzui Software is a web and software development company based in Karlskrona, Sweden.

Aiming to serve clients’ needs of custom solutions without complicated lock-ins and licencing-fees, the company almost exclusively utilizes open-source software and programming languages in their process of development.

It’s staff being fluent in Japanese, the original long-term goal of the company has been to gradually niche towards business related to Japan, in the future establishing an office in the country.

The company was started and is jointly owned by Fredrik KarlstrÃ¶m and Anders MÃ¥rtensson, while they both attended the NTI high-school in Karlskrona, Sweden.
